mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pkg(PKG_NUM, GUIDE_NUM, staff_number, PKG_NAME, PKG_THEME, PKG_PRICE, PKG_PERIOD, PKG_CONTENT, PKG_MEMBER_MIN, PKG_MEMBER_CUR, PKG_MEMBER_MAX, PKG_REVIEW, PKG_CAUTION, PKG_REFERENCE, PKG_WEATHER_INFO, PKG_MEETING_PLACE, PKG_CATE, PKG_REGDATE, PKG_UPTDATE, continent_name, country_num, city_num) VALUES(#{pkgNum},'gui1',#{staffNumber},#{pkgName},#{pkgTheme},#{pkgPrice},#{pkgPeriod},#{pkgContent}, #{pkgMemberMin},#{pkgMemberCur},#{pkgMemberMax},#{pkgReview},#{pkgCaution},#{pkgReference},#{pkgWeatherInfo}, #{pkgMeetingPlace},#{pkgCate},sysdate,sysdate,'아시아','ca1','ca101')
INSERT INTO restore(FILE_NO, RES_NUM, FOLD, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_NAME, CRE_DATE, ETC) VALUES(res_seq.nextval,#{resNum},#{fold},#{storedFileName}, #{fileName},sysdate,#{etc})
